TopicTitle: New Orbit (indie space game with real physics, asteroids and spaceship construction)

Articles.Content:
http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/467671205/new-orbit

I boughht episode 1 of this awesome game half a year ago and I must say, for a mobile game, it was very impressive. It looks very cool, has a very polished and easy to use UI, great mechanics and physics. All asteroids have their own gravitational field,can be mined, they can slingshot you, you can get into orbit, land, dock with ships, fly on comets-the first part was awesome, but the campaign was too short.

Help make episode 2 a reality and help the devs! If you join their beta list you get to be in the cockpit and mess around with ship parts in your web browser.

This game is awesome, it is for pc/mobile. It is one of the best space games I have played, try it!

Edited December 15, 2013 by iDan122
I loved the mobile game! This will be better!
I'm almost over all these space games, to me it seems like everyone's starting to jump on the bandwagon kind of like how all these blocky games came after Minecraft got successful

New Orbit project will only be funded if at least $40,000 is pledged by Friday Jan 24, $8,000 so far.

Looks promising
I think it's our duty to make ep2 happen! Remember, if you don't have the money or time to donate, the best you can do is share the link via social media.
